transcript.text: shalam is<font color="#E5E5E5"> Daniel John Lee with tour</font>
restoration ministries websites WWE
spirit and tour com so I'm right here at
PSU this is where i normally preach but
as I wanted<font color="#E5E5E5"> to be sensitive to the</font>
students this week because they're
taking finals I worked out a compromise
with the administration so I wasn't
allowed to get a<font color="#E5E5E5"> permit to actually</font>
start passing cards out inside the
building but the head supervisor of
Smith Memorial which is the main
building allowed me to put cards out on
the bulletin boards in the cafeteria and
at the main information center so I've
done that I've<font color="#E5E5E5"> tried to approach a few</font>
students today but a lot of them just
walk away from<font color="#CCCCCC"> me because they just are</font>
so upset with with me and my preaching
just because you know a lot<font color="#CCCCCC"> of them just</font>
hate<font color="#E5E5E5"> yeah so what I'm going to do is I'm</font>
<font color="#CCCCCC">going to go inside the</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> building and I'm</font>
going<font color="#E5E5E5"> to get some lunch with the</font>
cafeteria I was supposed to<font color="#CCCCCC"> meet a</font>
homeless guy here to feed him but he
<font color="#CCCCCC">hasn't responded to me at all and he</font>
hasn't<font color="#E5E5E5"> shown up so I'm gonna go get some</font>
lunch I'm going<font color="#E5E5E5"> to open up my Bible and</font>
I'm just<font color="#E5E5E5"> going to see</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> if the spirit</font>
bringing students to me to maybe talk or
whatever and we'll see what happens so
be praying for<font color="#E5E5E5"> me yeah</font><font color="#CCCCCC"> blessed Shalom</font>
websites<font color="#CCCCCC"> ww</font><font color="#E5E5E5"> spirit and tour com</font>
